message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing [Product Name] and I think you'd love it! I'm asking for $200 for it, which is a great deal considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the [Product Name]. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $175 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $175 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $185. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $165 for the [Product Name].

Bob, I see you're still trying to get a lower price, but $165 is simply not enough for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $175. This is a fair price, considering the product's value. Let's finalize this deal!
Alice, I'm glad we're making progress. I would like to counter with an offer of $168 for the [Product Name].
Bob, I'm starting to think we might not be able to agree on a price. I'm willing to go down to $170, but this is my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to move on to other buyers.
Alice, I appreciate your last offer. I would like to counter with an offer of $169 for the [Product Name].
